<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>true</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sc_ic_item_staging</collection> <condition>!gs.hasRole("catalog_admin")</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Draft Item Query</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var myCatalogCategories = getMyCatalogCategories();
if (myCatalogCategories.length > 0) { var query = 'sc_categoriesLIKE' + myCatalogCategories[0];
for (var i = 1; i < myCatalogCategories.length; i++) { query += '^ORsc_categoriesLIKE' + myCatalogCategories[i]; }
current.addEncodedQuery(query); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-02-19 21:28:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2fda49b05f0311001c9b2572f2b477d6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Draft Item Query</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Service Creator" source="com.glide.service_creator">5f4770a83cb1311068bcf327dfe37f66</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2fda49b05f0311001c9b2572f2b477d6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-05-29 06:27:59</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2fda49b05f0311001c9b2572f2b477d6"/> </record_update>
